decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy using creatures and spells with a focus on Azorius colors (Blue and White). It aims to control the board with cards like Cast Out and Stasis Snare, while countering opponent's spells with Negate. The deck features powerful creatures like Archangel Avacyn, Thalia, Heretic Cathar, Spell Queller, and Glory-Bound Initiate to deal damage quickly. It also includes defensive options like Selfless Spirit and Thraben Inspector. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional support and can help close out the game.

This deck focuses on quickly establishing board presence and applying pressure on the opponent using efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The key strategy is to utilize powerful threats like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Heart of Kiran, while also having access to counterspells and removal to control the opponent's plays. With a mix of aggressive creatures and versatile spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game before they can stabilize. Utilizing various card types and synergistic interactions, this Esper Aggro deck aims to win through a combination of tempo and aggression.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively and quickly overwhelming the opponent. It includes cards that enhance the power and toughness of creatures like Electrostatic Pummeler and Voltaic Brawler, as well as cards that generate energy like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit. The deck also includes cards that provide protection to creatures and allow for unexpected bursts of damage like Invigorated Rampage and Blossoming Defense. With a mix of strong creatures, energy generation, and combat tricks, the deck aims to quickly deal a large amount of damage to win the game swiftly.

This deck focuses on ramping up energy quickly to cast powerful creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Glorybringer. It utilizes cards like Aetherworks Marvel and Woodweaver's Puzzleknot to generate energy efficiently, while also having removal spells like Harnessed Lightning to control the board. Chandra, Flamecaller provides additional board control and card advantage, while cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Rogue Refiner help stabilize against aggressive decks. The deck aims to quickly ramp up energy, play powerful threats, and overwhelm the opponent before they can respond effectively.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence with strong creatures like Verdurous Gearhulk, Rishkar, and Glint-Sleeve Siphoner, while utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Longtusk Cub to pump up your creatures and overwhelm your opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with threats and Aether Hub to ensure you have the mana you need. This aggressive strategy aims to apply constant pressure on your opponent and secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on assembling a fast and aggressive board presence by utilizing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Veteran Motorist, and Scrapheap Scrounger. It also incorporates powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran to pressure opponents quickly. The inclusion of disruptive spells like Spell Queller and Unlicensed Disintegration adds versatility to the deck, allowing for removal of threats and disruption of opponents' game plans. By combining these elements, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of creatures, vehicles, and removal spells to secure victories through aggressive play.

The key concept of this deck is to play aggressively with a focus on using vehicles and strong creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck includes a mix of creatures, vehicles, removal spells, and lands to create a consistent and powerful aggro strategy. The deck aims to establish an early board presence with Toolcraft Exemplar, Veteran Motorist, and other creatures, while also utilizing vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan to maximize damage output. Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push provide removal options, while Gideon, Ally of Zendikar offers additional value and support.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive mono black creatures. By utilizing cards such as Lord of the Accursed and Metallic Mimic to pump up your zombie creatures, as well as generating additional creatures with abilities like Cryptbreaker and Dread Wanderer, this deck aims to quickly build a strong board presence and put pressure on the opponent. Cards like Liliana's Mastery and Dark Salvation provide additional support and removal options to solidify your position on the battlefield.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and removal spells. With a combination of high-value threats like Verdurous Gearhulk and Walking Ballista, supported by Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to boost their effectiveness, this deck aims to beat down the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push. By efficiently using its resources and applying pressure early on, this deck aims to secure a quick victory against its opponents.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to flood the board with aggressive creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner, Winding Constrictor, and Longtusk Cub, while using cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Verdurous Gearhulk to pump them up and create powerful threats. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats, and Nissa, Voice of Zendikar for additional creature generation. Overall, the goal is to apply early pressure and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of strong creatures and efficient removal spells.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Attune with Aether and Greenbelt Rampager to cast powerful threats like Verdurous Gearhulk and Walking Ballista. It also utilizes cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Winding Constrictor to buff up creatures and generate extra value. The deck aims to swarm the board with efficient threats and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and board presence.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays by utilizing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, backed up by powerful vehicles such as Heart of Kiran. The deck also incorporates countermagic like Metallic Rebuke and disruption with Spell Queller to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional threats and can create tokens to quickly close out the game. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistent early plays and maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures with efficient mana ramp and protection spells to quickly overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of aggressive threats. By curving out efficiently and supporting the aggressive game plan with strong creatures like Rhonas the Indomitable, Hazoret the Fervent, and Glorybringer, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain tempo throughout the game. With a solid mix of creatures, removal, and protection, the deck looks to apply consistent pressure and close out games before opponents can stabilize.

The deck is centered around using Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful cards like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger early in the game. It also includes cards like Harnessed Lightning, Glimmer of Genius, and Censor to control the board and protect the combo. The deck also has a utility package with cards like Rogue Refiner and Chandra, Flamecaller to generate card advantage and provide additional threats. The mana base is designed to support the Marvel activation and includes energy-generating lands like Aether Hub.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creature Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger quickly, overwhelming opponents with its devastating effect. The deck includes various energy-generating cards like Whirler Virtuoso and Servant of the Conduit to fuel the Marvel activation, along with card draw effects like Glimmer of Genius to find the pieces needed to assemble the combo. Additionally, cards like Chandra, Flamecaller provide additional control and board presence to support the main win condition.
